categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Parson was a male Human who served as a lieutenant in the Imperial Navy of the reconstituted Sith Empire aboard the Harrower-class dreadnought Tyrant. When the Grand Champion of the Great Hunt arrived at the Tyrant, Parson attempted to confiscate the bounty hunter's weapons, but the hunter refused and Parson was killed in the conflict.
